amendment.description: To require a report on the interoperability between electronic health records systems of the Department of Defense and the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1510 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1510 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1510 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1510 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 1463.
